Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences across all cases
Percentage of variants that include SW-Awaiting AE Assignment immediately after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting AE Assignment is followed by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment compared to the frequency of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Awaiting AE Assignment appears exactly once per case
Metric: the average of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Number of variants in which SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurs before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment events that are part of variants ending in an editorial decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment relative to the total number of AE-involved activities (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers, SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that are not followed by any AE assignment activity within 7 days
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases where 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' does not happen

Name: Number of cases where SW-Awaiting AE Assignment directly precedes a rejection outcome (e.g., SW-EIC Reject or SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in variants that contain at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in comparison to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of all manuscript submissions that transition through SW-Awaiting AE Assignment during their lifecycle
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
